approve_chore.description: Parent approves the chore, awarding points.

kid_name.name: Kid Name

chore_name.name: Chore Name
chore_name.description: The name of the chore being approved.

points_awarded.name: Points Awarded
points_awarded.description: Points to award (optional; defaults to the chore's points).

disapprove_chore.name: Disapprove Chore
disapprove_chore.description: Parent disapproves a chore for a kid, reverting its status.

kid_name.name: Kid Name
kid_name.description: The name of the kid whose chore is being disapproved.

chore_name.name: Chore Name
chore_name.description: The name of the chore being disapproved.

redeem_reward.name: Redeem Reward
redeem_reward.description: A parent redeems a reward for a kid, deducting points.

parent_name.name: Parent Name
parent_name.description: The parent authorizing the reward redemption.

reward_name.name: Reward Name
reward_name.description: The name of the reward to redeem.

approve_reward.name: Approve Reward
approve_reward.description: Parent approves a reward claimed by a kid.

kid_name.name: Kid Name
kid_name.description: The kid who is redeeming the reward.

reward_name.name: Reward Name
reward_name.description: The name of the reward being approved.

disapprove_reward.name: Disapprove Reward
disapprove_reward.description: Parent disapproves a reward redemption for a kid.

kid_name.name: Kid Name
kid_name.description: The kid whose reward redemption is being disapproved.

reward_name.name: Reward Name
reward_name.description: The name of the reward being disapproved.

apply_penalty.name: Apply Penalty
apply_penalty.description: A parent applies a penalty to deduct points.

penalty_name.name: Penalty Name
penalty_name.description: The name of the penalty to apply.

apply_bonus.name: Apply Bonus
apply_bonus.description: A parent applies a bonus to a kid, awarding points.

bonus_name.name: Bonus Name
bonus_name.description: The name of the bonus to apply.

reset_all_data.name: Reset All Data
reset_all_data.description: Completely clears the KidsChores data from storage.

reset_all_chores.name: Reset All Chores
reset_all_chores.description: Manually reset chores to pending state, removing claims and approvals.

reset_overdue_chores.name: Reset Overdue Chores
reset_overdue_chores.description: Reset overdue chore(s) back to the Pending state and reschedule them based on their recurring frequency and previous due date. You may optionally provide a chore_id (or chore_name) to reset a specific chore and optionally a kid_name to reset the chore only for that kid.

chore_id.name: Chore ID
chore_id.description: The internal ID of the chore to reset (optional if chore_name is provided).

chore_name.name: Chore Name
chore_name.description: The name of the chore to reset (optional if chore_id is provided).

set_chore_due_date.name: Set/Reset Chore Due Date
set_chore_due_date.description: Set (or clear) the due date for a chore. Provide the chore name and, if desired, a new due date. If no due date is provided the existing due date will be cleared. The service will reject due dates set in the past.

chore_name.name: Chore Name
chore_name.description: The name of the chore to update

due_date.name: Due Date
due_date.description: The new due date for the chore. Use the date/time selector to choose a valid date and time (in your local timezone). Leave empty to clear the due date.

skip_chore_due_date.name: Skip Chore Due Date
skip_chore_due_date.description: Skip the current due date of a recurring chore. This service immediately reschedules the chore's due date based on its recurring frequency and resets its state to pending. Any pending claims or approvals will be removed.

chore_id.name: Chore ID
chore_id.description: The internal ID of the chore to reset (optional if chore_name is provided).

chore_name.name: Chore Name
chore_name.description: The name of the chore to reset (optional if chore_id is provided).
